caption.p: Starch (upper panel: a, b) and soluble carbohydrate (lower panel: c, d) concentration of apical (close triangle) and basal (open triangle) of spikelets during post-anthesis period from 0 to 30 days at 5 day intervals in SR-157 (left panel: a, c) and SR-159 (right panel: b, d). Individual data represents the mean of 3 replicates (n = 3) and vertical bars represent ± SD values.
